article_text:
LOVELAND — Loveland schools will be closed Monday in observance of Presidents Day.

But the city of Loveland offices, library and Chilson Center will be open, and trash pickup will be on its usual schedule this week.

Larimer County offices will be closed for the holiday.

Also closed will be all Fort Collins city offices and the Gardens on Spring Creek.

Recreation facilities and libraries in Fort Collins will be open, and bus service will maintain regular hours.
